resources.string: Google officially announced its much-anticipated pixel phone;the pixel XL, on October 4. We attended Google London UK event, mirroring the main on talking place in san francisco,US, where the firm unwrapped the new Android 7.1 Nougat devices which will apparently usurp Google long-standing Nexus series
5.0 inches\n FHD AMOLED at 441ppi\n 2.5 Corning Gorilla Glass 4

2,770 mAh battery
 Standby time (LTE): up to 19 days
 Talk time (3g/WCDMA): up to 26 hours
 Internet use time (WI-FI):up to 13 hours
 Internet use time (LTE:up to 13 hours
 Video playback:up to 13hours
 Audio playback (via headset):up to110 hours
 Fast charging:up to 7 hours of use from only 15 minute of charging
